post_detail.description:
Execution:

This was a freelance project I took on because it offered the opportunity to combine my skills as a creative technologist with those required to run a business. A fashion designer came to me requesting an ecommerce site but lacked a process in which to accept orders, administer payments, ship packages, etc.

Acting as a technology consultant, I created a storefront for his brand, partner with a merchant account provider and streamlined operations.
post_detail.title: Nick + Campbell
